narrativeData.story: In the Celestial Twilight Isles, the sun and moon share the sky, casting a perpetual twilight over the lands. Mystical islands float above the clouds, each holding ancient secrets and powerful creatures. However, a dark force has begun to spread, corrupting the once peaceful inhabitants and threatening to plunge the world into eternal darkness.
narrativeData.greetingGameMessage: Welcome, brave hero, to the Celestial Twilight Isles. Your journey to save this world from the encroaching darkness starts now. May your courage and wit guide you through the mysteries of this enchanting realm.
